api_load.name: New API Stress Testing
api_load.description: Send duplicate requests to the new API server for load testing.

api_links.name: API-Based Link Lookups
api_links.description: Use the new API to look up links instead of the socket cluster.

emqx_pubsub.name: EMQX MQTT-Based PubSub
emqx_pubsub.description: An experimental pubsub system running on an EMQX cluster, to see how that performs.

cf_pubsub.name: CF MQTT-Based PubSub
cf_pubsub.description: An experimental new pubsub system that should be more reliable than the existing socket cluster.
